Data Base Administrator Network Administrator on short term contract basis in RO-Nagpur Sir; Kindly refer your letter NoNHAI/RO-NAGECG/Admin/2015/964 daled 15.10.2015 on the above mentioned subject. 2 In this connection; ] am directed to convey the approval of Competent Authority for engagement of one IT Engineer for a period of one year with effect from actual date of deployment of staff with a break of one after every 89 on short term contract basis in Regional Office-Nagpur: 3 _ The eligibility criteria, terms conditions and consolidated emoluments have decided for appointment of IT Engineer shall be as under:- SL: Consolidated No. Post Emoluments Educational Qualification For those holding Bachelor Degree in IT Engineer Rs.30,000/- IT/CSEIECE or Equivalent and experience in relevant field for at least three years in reputed company/lirm: (ii) The term of engagement of IT Engineer shall be same as stipulated in NHAI Policy Circular No.11041/217/2007-Admn dated 28./1.2007 enclosed). (iii) The format for appointment on contract a8 per HQ letter dated 05.05.2008 enclosed). (iv) The emoluments of IT Engineer shall be same as stipulated in NHAL Policy Circular No.11041/218/2007-Admn dated 27.01.2014 as engagement of Site Engineer/Supervisor and terms of services (copy enclosed) Yours faithfully, Encl: as above (Manoj Pande) AM (HReAdmn-III) Hianli 44 Fax NLI Top Nagar, Reg: day days (copy (copy
